thread.title: Loera Adrian
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Loera Adrian

author: Loera Adrian
title: Loera Adrian
text: Frames Direct is a very professional provider of frames. In my opinion it is a customer satisfaction goal in their behalf as well as doing business with a customer. If they do not have the frames or sunglasses they will do everything they leave the customer satisfied. I now have a direct provider of frames and sunglasses that I will not change in a long time.
